message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $11,500. I think it would be a valuable asset to you, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have a budget in mind and I'm trying to stay within it.

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget.  While that is a significant discount from my initial offer, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. I believe this product is worth every bit of that and will provide substantial value to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
